TopicTitle: Predicting the outcome of gravity assist.

Articles.Content:
When I'm trying to do a gravity assist using Mun I can see my current orbit (blue) and the one (yellow) that will be when I captured by Mun. But I want to see what kind of orbit will I have after the rocket laves Mun. Before entering Mun's sphere of influence of course.

Either a mod or settings file editing would do for me.

In settings cfg:

CONIC_PATCH_DRAW_MODE = 1

CONIC_PATCH_LIMIT = 2

increasse patch limit to see what will happend next. Also you can experiment with Mode (1 or 2 or 3) to see different display modes.

Patch limit = 5 is a good value, as you can see up to 4 SoI changes (but this won't happen often). Also, I personally prefer draw mode = 3, because it displays orbits around child bodies relative to their parents (so a slingshot around the Mun will appear smooth).

Patch limit = 5 is a good value, as you can see up to 4 SoI changes (but this won't happen often). Also, I personally prefer draw mode = 3, because it displays orbits around child bodies relative to their parents (so a slingshot around the Mun will appear smooth).
